alert.note: Alert for Marion; McPherson; Reno; Rice (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 10:52PM CDT until June 17 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... McPherson County in central Kansas... Northeastern Reno County in south central Kansas... Eastern Rice County in central Kansas... Western Marion County in central Kansas... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1052 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Buhler, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hutchinson, Mcpherson, Lindsborg, Hillsboro, South Hutchinson, Moundridge, Inman, Nickerson, Galva, Canton, Marquette, Little River, Goessel, Lehigh, Windom, Willowbrook, Mcpherson Airport, Roxbury and Hutchinson Airport. This includes Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 43 and 76. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
